content.html: Love this. This is what we live and breathe in our daily work at @_localstack Having decent mocks or emulators can boost your productivity, reducing the often tedious deploy&test cycles in the cloud. Not to mention the improved debuggability aspect of a fully local environment.
content.value:
Love this. This is what we live and breathe in our daily work at @_localstack

Having decent mocks or emulators can boost your productivity, reducing the often tedious deploy&test cycles in the cloud.

Not to mention the improved debuggability aspect of a fully local environment.
